title: If I activated the effect of Gem-Knight Phantom Quartz that Fusion Summons a "Gem-Knight" monster, can I include Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monsters in my Graveyard or that are banished as materials?
question: If I activated the effect of Gem-Knight Phantom Quartz that Fusion Summons a "Gem-Knight" monster, can I include Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monsters in my Graveyard or that are banished as materials?
answer: When performing a Fusion Summon using the effect of Gem-Knight Phantom Quartz, you can include Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, and/or Link Monsters as materials. For example, if you Fusion Summon a Gem-Knight Lady Lapis Lazuli, which requires Gem-Knight Lapis and another "Gem-Knight" monster, you can use a Gem-Knight Lapis and a Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond in your Graveyard as materials. (Gem-Knight Lapis returns to the Deck, but Gem-Knight Lady Brilliant Diamond returns to the Extra Deck.)
llm_answer: Yes, you can use any of those types of monsters from the Graveyard or that are banished as materials for the Fusion Summon. This is because the effect of Gem-Knight Phantom Quartz does not specify any restrictions on the type of monsters used as materials beyond being in the Graveyard or banished.
